segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills over the edge of the sink, creating a small puddle at her feet, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast of the calm garden outside with the chaos inside strikes me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how she must feel, so focused yet oblivious to the world around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, however, are a different story altogether.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is dangerously perched on a stool, reaching for those cookies like itâ€™s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her hand raised, looking expectant and eager, her eyes sparkling with mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
